name: Pop-op
description:
A fun and colorful orb popping game.

Click, drag or flick the orbs into similar ones in color to score points!

Different levels have different score requirements to unlock next level options.

This is a strategy game, so pay attention to which colored orbs  provide the most points in terms of score amount and note any drastic changes *hint* to the total score!

Otherwise have fun and flick away at those orbs!

Game objects, colors, game mechanics , effects, sounds and title of the game were all picked  by  my toddler :)

Any donations go to the mastermind behind this project (my toddler) 

Thanks!
